channel.title: EarthNet2021
channel.description: EarthNet2021 is a groundbreaking challenge and dataset to advance the state of localized climate impact forecasting using novel artificial intelligence methods.

item.title: Meet EarthNet2021 at CVPR EarthVision!
item.description:
We are at CVPR!

Our extended paper EarthNet2021: A large-scale dataset and challenge for Earth surface forecasting as a guided video prediction task got accepted to CVPR EarthVision Workshop üéâ.

The preprint is now available online on Arxiv.

We look forward meeting you virtually on June 19, 2021. üåçüõ∞

item.title: Meet EarthNet2021 at EGU!
item.description:
We are at EGU / vEGU21!

Christian Requena-Mesa will give a vPICO on ‚ÄúEarthNet2021: Self-supervised impact predictions of extreme weather.‚Äù at Session NP5.2 Complex systems science meets machine learning for new approaches to predictions and predictability estimation for geophysical systems! ü•≥

Listen to the vPICO from 11:13-11:15am CEST and meet us afterwards in the breakout chat from 11:43am-12:30pm.

item.title: We are introducing EarthNet2021 at NeurIPS!
